snippet: Signing David Wright and R.A. Dickey to contract extensions remains the top priority of the Mets this off-season, said Jeff Wilpon, the team's chief operating officer.
abstract: Signing David Wright and R.A. Dickey to contract extensions remains the top priority of the Mets this off-season, said Jeff Wilpon, the team's chief operating officer.

headline.main: Mets Still Want Wright and Dickey for the Long Term
